subject: Dear Carol: I Await Your Response
body:
Dear Carol,


Thanks for your response. I received your email and thank you for your
interest in this business/investment. I want to inform you that this
"Investment" is 100% legal and we will appreciate it if you will handle it
with all forms of seriousness.


My client is a top businesswoman and politician in Moldova, and recently
the sum of US$25,000,000.00 was given to her by some contractors she
recommended to United Nations International Children's Emergency Fund (
UNICEF ) for the supply of food and medicine in Ukraine, and because of her
position in the government, she cannot personally accept the fund by
herself in order not to leave trace of the fund to her name since she is
still a serving cabinet member in the government of her country.


Now this is the deal, my client wants to invest the money into a profitable
business that will generate good profits at the end of each year and she is
willing to pay you 20% of the total sum, if you assist her in receiving the
fund, and additional 10% of the Return On Investment (ROI), if you go into
business partnership with her, because she is interested in expanding her
business empire. All that is required from you is Trust and Commitment,
because she wants this large sum of money transferred with your assistance
and you have nothing to worry about regarding legality AT ALL.


I shall wait for your confirmation if you are willing to follow up this
business (Investment), before I proceed to perfect the legal document on
your name and forward your copy to you ASAP.


Kindly confirm your interest by providing the information below. They are
needed to prepare the legal documents between yourself and my client. I
assure you that the information will be used solely for the purpose
mentioned above.


Your Full Name:
Company Name:
Complete Address:
Direct Phone:
Age:
Occupation:


I will wait to hear from you with the above information. I hope to furnish
you with more information once you indicate your interest in executing this
project with us.


Yours truly,

Barrister Mark Oliver

subject: Re: Dear Carol: I Await Your Response
body:
Dear Barrister Mark Oliver,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. I understand the need for discretion in this matter and assure you of my utmost confidentiality. 

However, before we proceed further, I would like to know more about the nature of the business that your client is interested in investing in. Also, it would be helpful if you could provide me with more details about how this transaction will be carried out.

Here are my details:

Full Name: Eliza Dane
Address: 1234 Elm Street, London, UK
Occupation: Business Consultant

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Carol

subject: Re: Dear Carol: I Await Your Response
body:
Dear Carol,


Thanks for your response. I received your email and thank you once again
for your interest in this business/investment.


Prior to your email, Be advised that my client is interested in any good
business that will generate good profits at the end of every year. Also, Be
informed that more details of this business  (Investment) will be provided
to you upon confirmation of your willingness and readiness in this
transaction.


Kindly confirm your willingness/interest by providing a copy of your
identification and the information below. They are needed to prepare the
legal documents between yourself and my client. I assure you that the
information will be used solely for the purpose mentioned above.


Your Full Name:
Company Name:
Complete Address:
Direct Phone:
Age:
Occupation:


I will wait to hear from you with the above information. I hope to furnish
you with more information once you indicate your interest in executing this
project with us.


Yours truly,

Barrister Mark Oliver

subject: Re: Dear Carol: I Await Your Response
body:
Dear Barrister Mark Oliver,

Thank you for your response. I am indeed interested in this business opportunity and would like to proceed further. However, I noticed that some parts of your email were not clear, possibly due to some technical issues.

Could you please provide more details about the nature of the business investment? Also, you mentioned that you need a copy of my '...' and '...'. Could you please specify what documents or information you require?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Carol

subject: Re: Dear Carol: I Await Your Response
